name: Burn book
description:
Watch your Burn book feed for any signs of witchcraft, & report as many incriminating posts as possible. Created for the NCI Jam 2017 (Theme: Technology in the wrong time period).

  • Dana Law - 2D Art
  • Glen Ward - Code
  • Josephine Andrews - Code, Writing
